name: seat-reservation-system
description: Database transaction and concurrency control practice

scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec -T mysql sh -lc "mysql -udbuser -pdbpass1234 -D reservation_db -e 'SOURCE /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/01-schema.sql; SOURCE /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-init-data.sql;'"
